00036 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/form_maker/simbio_form_table_AJAX.inc.php';

00043 /* RECORD OPERATION */
00044 if (isset($_POST['saveData'])) {
00045     $groupName = trim(strip_tags($_POST['groupName']));
00046     // check form validity
00047     if (empty($groupName)) {
00048         utility::jsAlert(__('Group name can\'t be empty')); //mfc
00049     } else {
00050         $data['group_name'] = $dbs->escape_string($groupName);
00051         $data['input_date'] = date('Y-m-d');
00052         $data['last_update'] = date('Y-m-d');
00053 
00054         // create sql op object
00055         $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00056         if (isset($_POST['updateRecordID'])) {
00057             /* UPDATE RECORD MODE */
00058             // remove input date
00059             unset($data['input_date']);
00060             // filter update record ID
00061             $updateRecordID = (integer)$_POST['updateRecordID'];
00062             // update the data
00063             $update = $sql_op->update('user_group', $data, 'group_id='.$updateRecordID);
00064             if ($update) {
00065                 $dbs->query('DELETE FROM group_access WHERE group_id='.$updateRecordID);
00066                 // set group privileges
00067                 if (isset($_POST['read'])) {
00068                     foreach ($_POST['read'] as $module) {
00069                         // check write privileges
00070                         $is_write = 0;
00071                         if (isset($_POST['write'])) {
00072                             foreach ($_POST['write'] as $module_write) {
00073                                 if ($module_write == $module) {
00074                                     $is_write = 1;
00075                                 }
00076                             }
00077                         }
00078                         $dbs->query("INSERT INTO group_access VALUES ($updateRecordID, $module, 1, $is_write)");
00079                     }
00080                 }
00081                 // write log
00082                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' update group data ('.$groupName.')');
00083                 utility::jsAlert(__('Group Data Successfully Updated'));
00084                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', parent.getPreviousAJAXurl(), \'post\');</script>';
00085             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Group Data FAILED to Updated. Please Contact System Administrator')."\nDEBUG : ".$sql_op->error); }
00086             exit();
00087         } else {
00088             /* INSERT RECORD MODE */
00089             // insert the data
00090             $insert = $sql_op->insert('user_group', $data);
00091             if ($insert) {
00092                 $group_id = $dbs->insert_id;
00093                 // set group privileges
00094                 if (isset($_POST['read'])) {
00095                     foreach ($_POST['read'] as $module) {
00096                         // check write privileges
00097                         $is_write = 0;
00098                         if (isset($_POST['write'])) {
00099                             foreach ($_POST['write'] as $module_write) {
00100                                 if ($module_write == $module) {
00101                                     $is_write = 1;
00102                                 }
00103                             }
00104                         }
00105                         $dbs->query("INSERT INTO group_access VALUES ($group_id, $module, 1, $is_write)");
00106                     }
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 // write log
00110                 utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' add new group ('.$groupName.')');
00111                 utility::jsAlert(__('New Group Data Successfully Saved'));
00112                 echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00113             } else { utility::jsAlert(__('Group Data FAILED to Save. Please Contact System Administrator')."\n".$sql_op->error); }
00114             exit();
00115         }
00116     }
00117     exit();
00118 } else if (isset($_POST['itemID']) AND !empty($_POST['itemID']) AND isset($_POST['itemAction'])) {
00119     /* DATA DELETION PROCESS */
00120     $sql_op = new simbio_dbop($dbs);
00121     $failed_array = array();
00122     $error_num = 0;
00123     if (!is_array($_POST['itemID'])) {
00124         // make an array
00125         $_POST['itemID'] = array((integer)$_POST['itemID']);
00126     }
00127     // loop array
00128     foreach ($_POST['itemID'] as $itemID) {
00129         $itemID = (integer)$itemID;
00130         // get group data
00131         $group_q = $dbs->query('SELECT group_name FROM user_group WHERE group_id='.$itemID);
00132         $group_d = $group_q->fetch_row();
00133         if (!$sql_op->delete('user_group', 'group_id='.$itemID)) {
00134             $error_num++;
00135         } else {
00136             // also delete all records related to this data
00137             // delete group privileges
00138             $dbs->query('DELETE FROM group_access WHERE group_id='.$itemID);
00139             // write log
00140             utility::writeLogs($dbs, 'staff', $_SESSION['uid'], 'system', $_SESSION['realname'].' DELETE group ('.$group_d[0].')');
00141         }
00142     }
00143 
00144     // error alerting
00145     if ($error_num == 0) {
00146         utility::jsAlert(__('All Data Successfully Deleted'));
00147         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00148     } else {
00149         utility::jsAlert(__('Some or All Data NOT deleted successfully!\nPlease contact system administrator'));
00150         echo '<script type="text/javascript">parent.setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_POST['lastQueryStr'].'\', \'post\');</script>';
00151     }
00152     exit();
00153 }

00171 /* main content */
00172 if (isset($_POST['detail']) OR (isset($_GET['action']) AND $_GET['action'] == 'detail')) {
00173     /* RECORD FORM */
00174     $itemID = (integer)isset($_POST['itemID'])?$_POST['itemID']:0;
00175     $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM user_group WHERE group_id='.$itemID);
00176     $rec_d = $rec_q->fetch_assoc();
00177 
00178     // create new instance
00179     $form = new simbio_form_table_AJAX('mainForm', $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].'?'.$_SERVER['QUERY_STRING'], 'post');
00180     $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Save').'" class="button"';
00181 
00182     // form table attributes
00183     $form->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00184     $form->table_header_attr = 'class="alterCell" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00185     $form->table_content_attr = 'class="alterCell2"';
00186 
00187     // edit mode flag set
00188     if ($rec_q->num_rows > 0) {
00189         $form->edit_mode = true;
00190         // record ID for delete process
00191         $form->record_id = $itemID;
00192         // form record title
00193         $form->record_title = $rec_d['group_name'];
00194         // submit button attribute
00195         $form->submit_button_attr = 'name="saveData" value="'.__('Update').'" class="button"';
00196     }
00197 
00198     /* Form Element(s) */
00199     // group
00200     $form->addTextField('text', 'groupName', __('Group Name').'*', $rec_d['group_name'], 'style="width: 60%;"');
00201     // privileges
00202         // get group access data
00203         $priv_data = array();
00204         $rec_q = $dbs->query('SELECT * FROM group_access WHERE group_id='.(!empty($rec_d['group_id'])?$rec_d['group_id']:0));
00205         while ($access_data = $rec_q->fetch_assoc()) {
00206             $priv_data[$access_data['module_id']]['r'] = $access_data['r'];
00207             $priv_data[$access_data['module_id']]['w'] = $access_data['w'];
00208         }
00209     $priv_table = '';
00210     include 'module_priv_form.inc.php';
00211     $form->addAnything(__('Privileges'), $priv_table);
00212 
00213     // edit mode messagge
00214     if ($form->edit_mode) {
00215         // print out the object
00216         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.__('You are going to edit Group data').' : <b>'.$rec_d['group_name'].'</b>  <br />'.__('Last Update').$rec_d['last_update'].'</div>'; //mfc
00217     }
00218     echo $form->printOut();
00219 } else {
00220     /* GROUP LIST */
00221     // table spec
00222     $table_spec = 'user_group AS ug';
00223 
00224     // create datagrid
00225     $datagrid = new simbio_datagrid();
00226     $datagrid->setSQLColumn('ug.group_id',
00227         'ug.group_name AS \''.__('Group Name').'\'',
00228         'ug.last_update AS \''.__('Last Update').'\'');
00229     $datagrid->setSQLorder('group_name ASC');
00230 
00231     // is there any search
00232     $criteria = 'ug.group_id != 1';
00233     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00234        $keywords = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['keywords']);
00235        $criteria .= " AND ug.group_name LIKE '%$keywords%'";
00236     }
00237     $datagrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00238 
00239     // set table and table header attributes
00240     $datagrid->icon_edit = SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/edit.gif';
00241     $datagrid->table_attr = 'align="center" id="dataList" cellpadding="5" cellspacing="0"';
00242     $datagrid->table_header_attr = 'class="dataListHeader" style="font-weight: bold;"';
00243     // set delete proccess URL
00244     $datagrid->chbox_form_URL = $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00245 
00246     // put the result into variables
00247     $datagrid_result = $datagrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, 20, true);
00248     if (isset($_GET['keywords']) AND $_GET['keywords']) {
00249         $msg = str_replace('{result->num_rows}', $datagrid->num_rows, __('Found <strong>{result->num_rows}</strong> from your keywords')); //mfc
00250         echo '<div class="infoBox">'.$msg.' : "'.$_GET['keywords'].'"</div>';
00251     }
00252 
00253     echo $datagrid_result;
00254 }
00255 /* main content end */
00256 ?>
